full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 459 Filed 11/15/21 Page 40 of 43 40 LalWmaxC your Honor. THE COURT: Ms. Sternheim. MS. STERNHEIM: Briefly, Judge. What courtroom will the jury be selected, and where will the trial be held? THE COURT: OK, Questionnaires will be filled out in the jury assembly room and in a ninth floor courtroom, as the district has been doing jury selection throughout Covid. So there would typically -- to the extent it happens in those rooms, typically there's a live feed between the jury assembly room and the ninth floor courtroom that will be able to hold, and I think we might even have an additional room to get up to the 100 people per panel. That's 500 Pearl, those spaces for the filling out of the questionnaire. I believe what we will do for the voir dire practice I described, it will take place on the fifth floor of the Thurgood Marshall Courthouse in courtroom -- My deputy asked me to pause and confirm. Ms. Maxwell, are you still on the line? THE DEFENDANT: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: OK. Great. Ms. Pomerantz. MS. POMERANTZ: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: Ms. Sternheim, you're still on. MS. STERNHEIM: Yes, your Honor. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00007012
